com.xith3d.scenegraph
Class Background

java.lang.Object
  com.xith3d.scenegraph.SceneGraphObject
      com.xith3d.scenegraph.Node
          com.xith3d.scenegraph.Leaf
              com.xith3d.scenegraph.Background
public class Background
extends Leaf

Background defines either a solid color or a background image that is used to fill the window at the beginning of each new frame.

Author:
Scott Shaver, William Denniss

Background

public Background(BranchGroup bg)
Constructs a new Background object with the geometry. The camera mode is set initially to View.VIEW_FIXED_POSITION

Background

public Background(BranchGroup bg,
                  View.CameraMode cameraMode)
Constructs a new Background object with the geometry and camera mode used to render it.

See Also:
